Sequence Information.Source: Terrestrial blue-green alga Anabaena laxa or the marine cyanobacterium Lyngbya Majuscula
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Tumor cells:CEM/VM-1 (40% inhibition at 1 µM); CEM-VLB (40% inhibition at 1 µM); CEM-WT (40% inhibition at 1 µM); CEM/VM-1 (44% inhibition at 1 µM); CEM-VLB (44% inhibition at 1 µM); CEM-WT (44% inhibition at 1 µM); CEM-WT (50% inhibition at 1 µM)

Literature.Title: Cytotoxic effect of Laxaphycins A and B on human lymphoblastic cells (CCRF-CEM) using digitised videomicrofluorometry
Literature.Author: Gbankoto A, Vigo J, Dramane K, Banaigs B, Aina E, Salmon JM.
